ModMetaData.name: Mortar Accuracy
ModMetaData.author: Hob Took
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of changes and options to make mortar accuracy better/worse, instead of having a fixed spread radius of 13 tiles.
-Accuracy is affected by a colonist's Intellectual and/or Shooting skills -Automatically lead moving targets -Accuracy is affected by weather and time of day -When targeting, preview a projectile's hit radius or show explosive radius -The miss chance caused by targets being in cover is removed
This affects all mortar shots, including enemy mortars.
Supports other mods: In general, any added mortars are supported (artillery, catapults, ballistas, etc.). Technically anything using the verb Verb_Shoot and has a force miss radius is assumed to be a mortar and is affected by this mod.
Load order does not matter in order to affect modded mortars.
